creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: light blue/green slightly deformed oval bowl; smaller irregular shaped sculptural object; matte black rectangluar tray with warping on one side, on three long feet
markings: square impressed maker\'s mark on lower body of bowl; paper tag on bottom of bowl: 0034-2 S
signed: incised bottom of bowl and bottom of tray: Staley / 1993
title: Fired Ice and Bowl on Black Tray
